item.title: The Voice Over Coach - Audacity Basics 1- Envelope Editing
item.itunes:author: Michael Minetree
item.itunes:subtitle: Free Learning Video Podcast. Learn various techniques from The Voice Over Coach.
item.itunes:summary: In this video we learn basic envelope editing in Audacity - the free audio editor.
item.itunes:keywords: voice over training, voice over student, online voice talent casting, voice over directory, voice over demos online, voice over scams

item.title: The Voice Over Coach - Sound Forge - Intermediate 1 - Eliminating P-Pops
item.itunes:author: Michael Minetree
item.itunes:subtitle: Free Learning Video Podcast. Learn various techniques from The Voice Over Coach.
item.itunes:summary: In this video we learn one strategy for eliminating P-Pops in your audio productions - using Sony Sound Forge Audio Studio.
item.itunes:keywords: voice over training, voice over student, online voice talent casting, voice over directory, voice over demos online, voice over scams

item.title: The Voice Over Coach - Sound Forge - Advanced 1 - Noise Reduction in Noisy Environments
item.itunes:author: Michael Minetree
item.itunes:subtitle: Free Learning Video Podcast. Learn various techniques from The Voice Over Coach.
item.itunes:summary: In this video we learn how to reduce noise in our audio recordings, which often shows up in our reads while on the road or in less that ideal recording environments such as hotel rooms or untreated studio spaces. This edition uses a process called Reverse-Phase (or inverted phase) Noise Cancellation in Sony Sound Forge Audio Studio v.10
item.itunes:keywords: voice over training, voice over student, online voice talent casting, voice over directory, voice over demos online, voice over scams
